statements: SELECT * FROM airports;
SELECT airport_name, runway_length FROM airports;
SELECT * FROM airports WHERE runway_length > 3000;
SELECT airport_name, facilities FROM airports WHERE runway_length < 5000;
SELECT * FROM airports ORDER BY airport_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM airports ORDER BY airport_id DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT airport_name, runway_length FROM airports WHERE runway_length > 5000
SELECT airport_name, facilities FROM airports WHERE facilities LIKE '%restaurant%'
SELECT * FROM airports WHERE runway_length BETWEEN 3000 AND 6000 ORDER BY airport_name
SELECT airport_name, runway_length, facilities FROM airports WHERE facilities IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM airports;
SELECT airport_name, runway_length FROM airports;
SELECT * FROM runways WHERE runway_length > 5000;
SELECT airport_name, facilities FROM airports WHERE airport_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM runways ORDER BY runway_length DESC;
SELECT * FROM airports WHERE runway_length > 3000;
SELECT * FROM runways WHERE airport_id = 5 AND runway_length < 5000;
SELECT airport_name, facilities FROM airports WHERE runway_length BETWEEN 2000 AND 4000;
SELECT * FROM airports ORDER BY airport_id DESC;
SELECT runway_name, runway_length FROM runways WHERE runway_length > 2500 ORDER BY runway_length DESC;
SELECT * FROM AirportInformation;
SELECT airport_name, runway_length FROM AirportInformation WHERE runway_length > 5000;
SELECT facility_name, facility_type FROM FacilitiesInformation ORDER BY facility_type DESC;
SELECT * FROM PilotsInformation WHERE pilot_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT pilot_name, pilot_license, airport_code FROM PilotsInformation WHERE airport_code = 'JFK';
SELECT * FROM AirportInformation;
SELECT airport_name, runway_length FROM AirportInformation ORDER BY runway_length DESC;
SELECT * FROM FacilitiesInformation WHERE facility_type = 'Control Tower';
SELECT DISTINCT airport_code FROM PilotsInformation;
SELECT airport_name, pilot_name, pilot_license FROM AirportInformation JOIN PilotsInformation ON AirportInformation.airport_code = PilotsInformation.airport_code;
SELECT * FROM airports ORDER BY airport_id DESC;
SELECT airport_name, city FROM airports WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT AVG(runway_length) FROM runways;
SELECT runway_length, airport_id FROM runways WHERE runway_length > 2000;
SELECT airport_name, city, runway_length FROM airports JOIN runways ON airports.airport_id = runways.airport_id ORDER BY runway_length DESC;
SELECT * FROM airports ORDER BY airport_name DESC, airport_id ASC;
SELECT airport_name, country, city FROM airports WHERE country='USA' AND city='New York';
SELECT airport_name, runway_length FROM airports INNER JOIN runways ON airports.airport_id = runways.airport_id WHERE runway_length > 3000;
SELECT pilots.pilot_name, pilots.license_type, facilities.facility_name FROM pilots LEFT JOIN facilities ON pilots.pilot_id = facilities.facility_id;
SELECT DISTINCT country FROM airports WHERE city IN ('London', 'Paris', 'Tokyo');
SELECT * FROM airports
SELECT airport_name, runway_length FROM airports
SELECT facility_name FROM facilities WHERE facility_type = 'Control Tower'
SELECT * FROM runways ORDER BY runway_length DESC
SELECT pilot_name FROM pilots WHERE airport_id = 1
SELECT * FROM airports WHERE runway_length > 3000 ORDER BY airport_name DESC
SELECT airport_name, runway_length, facilities FROM airports INNER JOIN runways ON airports.airport_id = runways.airport_id WHERE runways.runway_length < 5000
SELECT pilot_name, pilot_license_number FROM pilots WHERE airport_id = 3 AND pilot_id IN (SELECT pilot_id FROM flights WHERE airport_id = 3)
SELECT * FROM facilities WHERE facility_type = 'Control Tower' LIMIT 5
SELECT airport_name, SUM(runway_length) AS total_runway_length FROM airports INNER JOIN runways ON airports.airport_id = runways.airport_id GROUP BY airport_name HAVING total_runway_length > 8000
